name: mobx-state-tree
description: Opinionated state container for MobX powered applications

scripts.build: npm run quick-build && npm run webpack
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run build-docs
scripts.test-travis: npm run build && istanbul cover tape test/*.js
scripts.coverage: npm run quick-build && istanbul cover tape test/*.js
scripts.build-docs: npm run quick-build && documentation readme lib/mobx-state-tree.js --github --section API

author: Michel Weststrate
